structure.unit: ARTICLE XCVIII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY YOUTH CRIME TASK FORCE

law.catch_line: Applicability of State and County laws.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1436. Applicability of State and County laws.
The Task Force shall be regulated by the Standards for Creation and Review of Boards Generally Ordinance (Sections 2-11.36 et. al. of the Code of Miami-Dade County), Chapter 286 of Florida Statutes (the "Sunshine Law") and Chapter 119 of Florida Statutes (the "Public Records Law"). However, members of the Youth Crime Task Force may sit on more than one (1) County advisory board, but no more than two (2) County advisory boards.
Methods of organization and conduct of business shall be governed by Mason's Manual of Legislative Procedure (1953 Edition).
Task Force members shall be regulated by the State of Florida Code of Ethics for Public Officers and Employees and the Miami-Dade County Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics ordinance.
